content: create your own charming hair accessory with this beginner-friendly crochet hair ribbon pattern perfect for adding a touch of whimsy to your summer outfits this simple yet elegant hair ribbon is an ideal project for crochet newcomers the lightweight design makes it an excellent addition to any breezy summer ensemble providing a delightful pop of style without weighing you down i used cotton yarn but you could use acrylic written in us terms in english
